name: Pigeonmow
description:
A simple game about mowing lawns, getting medals, and possibly pigeon extermination.

FEATURES:

Two different mower types to slay weeds with.

Numerous obstacles to overcome.

A score system that grades you each run.

Beautiful hand-crafted low poly levels and artwork.

Pigeons.

This is my first completed  game project, humble though it might be. I thoroughly hope you guys enjoy it and find fun in it. I will continue to update the project as needed and take into consideration any feedback as I'd like to continue supporting it and releasing things (levels, mowers, etc.) for it.
